DOC.brief_summary: This innovative timely study measure impact Affordable Care Act ( ACA ) Medicaid expansion diabetes mellitus ( DM ) prevention , treatment , expenditures health outcome . To assess natural policy experiment , investigator use electronic health record data ADVANCE clinical data research network ( CDRN ) National Patient-Centered Clinical Research Network ( PCORnet ) .
DOC.brief_title: Post ACA Reform : Evaluation Community Health Center Care Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes mellitus ( DM ) one prevalent chronic disease , affect 29 million people United States ( US ) . The number people DM expect increase 200 % 2005 2050 , 16 48 million . Health insurance continue access healthcare service essential optimal DM care management ; thus , hypothesize Affordable Care Act ( ACA ) Medicaid expansion could substantially improve access health insurance essential healthcare service patient DM risk ( age â‰¥45 + overweight ) patient diagnose DM . Studies single state Medicaid expansion show increased utilization healthcare service , access provider , receipt preventive care service , improve health outcome post-expansion ; however , past study concurrent control state . In 2012 , US Supreme Court rule state legally require implement ACA Medicaid expansion , create 'natural policy experiment ' - unique national opportunity test effect ACA Medicaid expansion healthcare access service patient risk DM diagnose DM ( 'with DM risk DM ' ) . By January 1 , 2015 , 28 state District Columbia implemented expansion ; Medicaid enrollment increase estimate 12.9 % expansion state , compare 2.6 % non-expansion state . The investigator propose use unprecedented natural policy experiment study effect state-level Medicaid expansion DM prevention , treatment , expenditures , health outcome . As many person affect DM ACA Medicaid expansion receive primary care safety net community health center ( CHCs ) , propose analysis use electronic health record ( EHR ) data national ADVANCE clinical data research network ( CDRN ) CHCs ( ADVANCE one 11 CDRNs national PCORnet data network ) . The ADVANCE CDRN patient-level data 470 CHCs 12 Medicaid expansion state ( n=1,242,823 patient ) 248 CHCs 9 non-expansion state ( n=830,399 patient ) . This nationally unique data resource let investigator measure pre-post DM-related utilization receipt preventive service expansion versus non-expansion state , illuminate impact ACA Medicaid expansion DM prevention treatment Our propose study , Post ACA Reform : EValuation community hEalth ceNTer care Diabetes ( PREVENT-D ) follow specific aim : Aim 1 . Compare pre-post insurance status , overall visit , chronic disease management visit among patient DM risk DM , expansion versus non-expansion state . Aim 2 . Compare pre-post receipt primary secondary DM preventive service ( e.g. , screen obesity , lipid level , glycosylated hemoglobin ) among patient DM risk DM , expansion versus non-expansion state . Aim 3 . Compare pre-post change DM-related biomarkers ( e.g. , body mass index , blood pressure , lipid level ) patient DM risk DM among newly insure ( gain Medicaid post-period ) , already insure ( coverage pre- post-period ) , continuously uninsured ( coverage pre- post-period ) patient state expand Medicaid . Aim 4 : Measure pre-post change Oregon Medicaid expenditures among newly insure compare already insured patient DM risk DM .
DOC.criteria: Patients intervention control state aged 2064 Patients intervention control clinic outside age range 2064 Pregnant woman eliminate possibility gestational diabetes mellitus diagnosis
